name: Portall
author: need4swede
description: Portall provides an intuitive web interface for generating, tracking, and organizing ports and services across multiple hosts. Features Docker integration, port scanning, tagging system, and import/export tools.

form_fields.label: Secret Key
form_fields.hint: Flask secret key for session security (auto-generated)

form_fields.label: Enable Docker Integration
form_fields.hint: Enable Docker API integration for container management

form_fields.label: Docker Host
form_fields.hint: Docker daemon connection string (use tcp://socket-proxy:2375 for socket-proxy integration)

form_fields.label: Host IP Address
form_fields.hint: IP address of your host (leave empty for auto-detection)
